div.p: After I concluded the letter, it comes to me that the evangelicals have also conquered the citadel or fortress at Metz by force.

Also, that the one from Moëns has a large force at Vienna, both cavalry and infantry. There are supposed to be about 9000 Gascons with him; they intend to attack the Confederates, who are now marching there.
Those in Lyon dare not come out more than the others, and the situation in Dauphiné, Provence, and Languedoc... the whole of Narbonensian Gaul is going very well.
